meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Molly Strothmann Art Seaman Patrick Fernan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4434.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Molly Strothmann, a graduate student from Norman, Oklahoma
Art Seaman, a minister from Kittanning, Pennsylvania
Patrick Fernan, a government manager from Madison, Wisconsin (whose 3-day cash winnings total $56,200)

tr.td: TRANSPORTATION
'80s SONGS
RAPPIN' WITH THE RAPTORS
THE HIGHEST-SCORING SCRABBLE WORD
AMERICAN HISTORY
"T"EASE ME

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 2003 this country opened the world\'s longest steel-arched bridge, over the Huangpu River')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 2003 this country opened the world's longest steel-arched bridge, over the Huangpu River
